LanguageData.Lock_ChildrenLock_Description: Minimal age needed for humanlike pawn to open doors
LanguageData.Locks_AlwaysPensDoor_Description: When enabled every door will has "pens door" option turn on after construction.
LanguageData.Locks_AnomaliesIgnoreLocks_Description: When disables anomalies will respect door locks settings.
LanguageData.Locks_DebugWidget_Description: Enable debug button on each player door to help check door status for selected pawn
LanguageData.Locks_Description: When unlocked all pawn will be allowed to use this door.\n[Right click for more options]
LanguageData.Locks_ITabLockedDesc: When unlocked door settings do not apply, therefore all humanoids capable of opening doors can pass.
LanguageData.Locks_ITabVisitorsAllowedDesc: When disabled, allies and traders will not be allowed to pass through this door. This setting do not apply when owners are set.
LanguageData.Locks_ITabPetDoorDesc: When enabled small animals, like dogs can pass through door. This setting is not required for doors without owners.
LanguageData.Locks_ITabPensDoorDesc: When enabled, pens animals can't pass through the door. Some doors may not block animals (e.g. Animal Flap). Check "roamerCanOpen" in defs.
LanguageData.Locks_ITabSlaveDoorsDesc: When disabled slaves are not allowed to pass through this door. This setting do not apply when owners are set.
LanguageData.Locks_ITabAnimalAllowedDesc: When disabled all animals will not be allowed to pass through this door. This setting is checked after pens and pet door settings.
LanguageData.Locks_ITabChangeLocksNotification: Change lock in order to apply settings!
LanguageData.Locks_AlertLocksCantBeChangedDesc: Some locks can't be changed, because owners of those locks do not perform flick jobs:\n\n{0}
LanguageData.Locks_AlertLocksCantBeChangedDefaultDesc: Some locks can't be changed, because owners of those locks do not perform flick jobs.
LanguageData.Locks_ITabChildrenLockDesc: When enabled only humanlike pawn over age (check options) are allowed to pass through this door. Works only on pawn from that same faction as door.
LanguageData.Locks_DebugCheck_Desc: Check if selected pawn can use door. Window also contains debug information which should be shared with locks developer.
